alluminumIndustry.body: Hydro is a leading player in the aluminum industry, both globally and locally, with a comprehensive presence in many countries and activities covering the entire value chain from raw material extraction to the development of sustainable aluminum solutions. Our integrated business allows us to serve a wide range of customers in various market segments, ensuring that we can meet diverse needs and requirements. At the same time, we anchor our activities locally by creating job opportunities and collaborating with local communities, which strengthens our commitment to sustainability and innovation. This combined focus on global reach and local adaptation makes Hydro a trusted partner in the aluminum industry, creating value at all levels.
